casebody.data:
Vester WARD, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 11683. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 30, 1946. Chas. R. Robinson, of Birmingham, Ala., for appellant. Hartwell Davis, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Montgomery, Ala., for appellee.

Before HOLMES, McCORD, and LEE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
